 Number of times page was pinned recursively or concurrently. More...

 Number of pages that were stolen away after the first hit. More...

 Number of pages resolved in the first attempt to pin the page. More...

 Number of pages missed in the first attempt to pin the page. More...

db_counter_t second_miss
 Number of pages missed in the second attempt to pin the page. More...
 
db_counter_t frame_scan
 Number of times a buffer was checked as a possible candidate for a pin. More...
 
db_counter_t restart
 Number of scanning restarts due to page pin. More...
 
db_counter_t discard
 Number of times a page was discarded from the cache. More...
 
db_counter_t page_load
 Number of times a page was loaded from a file. More...
 
db_counter_t page_flush
 Total number of times a page was flushed to a file. More...
 
db_counter_t bg_flush
 Number of pages flushed in the background. More...
 
db_counter_t force_flush
 Number of pages flushed when a flush was forced. More...
 
db_counter_t lazy_flush
 Number of pages flushed when a lazy write was issued. More...
 

Detailed Description

Statistics on internal buffers.

These values can be used to evaluate cache performance.

See also
db_stat_bufmgr
